sentences.cn: …一颗镶嵌在金子里的蓝宝石。

sentences.en: A gold mine is not a bottomless pit, the gold runs out.
sentences.cn: 金矿并非无底的宝藏，金子终究会被采光。

sentences.en: An Olympic gold medal is the most sought-after prize in world sport.
sentences.cn: 在世界体坛上，一枚奥运会金牌是最令人向往的奖项。

sentences.en: Every year they panned about a ton and a half of gold.
sentences.cn: 每年他们淘出大约1.5吨金子。

sentences.en: He entered for many competitions, winning several gold medals.
sentences.cn: 他参加过多次比赛，赢得了数枚金牌。

sentences.en: He has probably said goodbye to his last chance of Olympic gold.
sentences.cn: 他可能已经失去了夺取奥运会金牌的最后机会。

sentences.en: His ambition was to win gold at the Atlanta Games in 1996.
sentences.cn: 他的志向是在1996年亚特兰大奥运会上夺取金牌。

sentences.en: It was an unbelievable moment when Chris won the gold medal.
sentences.cn: 克里斯赢得金牌的那一刻令人不可思议。

sentences.en: Moreau took gold in the five-kilometre individual pursuit competition.
sentences.cn: 莫罗在个人五公里追逐赛中获得金牌。

sentences.en: She came to the party dripping with gold (= wearing a lot of gold ) .
sentences.cn: 她披金戴银地来参加派对。

sentences.en: Snape wrote a receipt with a gold fountain pen.
sentences.cn: 斯内普用金笔开了一张收据。

sentences.en: Tables are set with white china and gold-banded silver cutlery.
sentences.cn: 桌上摆放着白色瓷器和镶着金边的银制餐具。

sentences.en: The boys were as good as gold on our walk.
sentences.cn: 我们散步的时候，这帮小男孩表现得很乖。

sentences.en: The owner insisted on Cool Ground running in the Gold Cup.
sentences.cn: 主人坚持要让“酷地”参加金杯赛马会。

sentences.en: The programme was a gold mine for small production companies.
sentences.cn: 这一方案能为产量较小的公司带来滚滚财源。

sentences.en: Theresa Zabell ran away with the women's gold medal.
sentences.cn: 特雷莎·扎贝尔轻松获得了女子金牌。

sentences.en: This little ball of gold weighs a quarter of an ounce.
